column4: Has anyone has success in installing libgtk2.0-dev? It keeps complaining: http://pastie.org/924483 ; I've already run sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade
-f tries to fix the broken packages
look like your stuck in dependency loop there :/
it looks like the versions of libcairo2 is very slightly different from libcairo2-dev I think
the problem is that it is looking for libcairo21.8.8-2ubuntu1 but the repo has  1.8.8-2ubuntu1.1
hmm you could try forcing it to install
I wonder how the repo got into this state though
tried that, same result i.e. 'E: Broken packages'
you may want to report a bug against libcairo2-dev
in the bug report link to your pastebins
